DIVISION OF CONTINUING EDUCATION
DIRECTOR, EDUCATIONAL MEDIA
220 Agriculture Hall
Corvallis, Oregon 97331
503/754-3424
OREGON STATE SYSTEM OF HIGHER EDUCATION
April 12, 1967
Mr. Jerrold Sandler
Executive Director
National Educational Radio
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington, D. C. 20036
Dear Jerry:
Attached for your information is a copy of a
letter I recently sent to all members of the House
and Senate Subcommittees on Communications.
As I mentioned to you earlier, I have already
made direct contact in person with the Oregon
delegation regarding this legislation.
Regards,
Luke F. Lamb
Director
end.
LFLsfcr
Educational media—Audiovisual instruction, KOAC AM-TV, Corvallis; KOAP FM-TV, Portland
DIVISION OF CONTINUING EDUCATION SERVES THE STATE OF OREGON THROUGH FACILITIES AND RESOURCES OF COLLEGES AND UNIVER¬
SITIES OF THE OREGON STATE SYSTEM OF HIGHER EDUCATION. AND IN COOPERATION WITH OTHER EDUCATIONAL AND STATE AGENCIES.
